verses.verse: It happened in the <S%H7637>seventh<s%> <S%H8141>year,<s%> in the <S%H2549>fifth<s%> <S%H6218>month,<s%> the tenth day of the <S%H2320>month,<s%> that <S%H582>certain<s%> of the <S%H2205>elders<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> to <S%H1875>inquire<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> and <S%H3427>sat<s%> before <S%H6440>me.<s%>
The <S%H1697>word<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> came to <S%H559>me,<s%> saying,

<S%H1121>Son<s%> of <S%H120>man,<s%> <S%H1696>speak<s%> to the <S%H2205>elders<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> and <S%H559>tell<s%> <S%H559>them,<s%> Thus says the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H136>Yahweh:<s%> Is it to <S%H1875>inquire<s%> of me that you have <S%H935>come?<s%> As I <S%H2416>live,<s%> <S%H5002>says<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>Yahweh,<s%> I will not be inquired of by <S%H1875>you.<s%>
Will you <S%H8199>judge<s%> <S%H1121>them,<s%> son of <S%H120>man,<s%> will you <S%H8199>judge<s%> <S%H3045>them?<s%> Cause them to know the <S%H8441>abominations<s%> of their <S%H1>fathers;<s%>

and <S%H559>tell<s%> <S%H559>them,<s%> Thus says the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>Yahweh:<s%> In the <S%H3117>day<s%> when I <S%H977>chose<s%> <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> and <S%H3027>swore<s%> <S%H5375>to<s%> the <S%H2233>seed<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3290>Jacob,<s%> and made myself <S%H3045>known<s%> to them in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> when I <S%H3027>swore<s%> <S%H5375>to<s%> <S%H559>them,<s%> saying, I am <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> your <S%H430>God;<s%>

in that <S%H3117>day<s%> I <S%H3027>swore<s%> <S%H5375>to<s%> <S%H3318>them,<s%> to bring them forth out of the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> into a <S%H776>land<s%> that I had <S%H8446>searched<s%> out for <S%H2100>them,<s%> flowing with <S%H2461>milk<s%> and <S%H1706>honey,<s%> which is the <S%H6643>glory<s%> of all <S%H776>lands.<s%>

I <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H7993>them,<s%> Cast away every <S%H376>man<s%> the <S%H8251>abominations<s%> of his <S%H5869>eyes,<s%> and <S%H2930>don't<s%> defile yourselves with the <S%H1544>idols<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt;<s%> I am <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> your <S%H430>God.<s%>

But they <S%H4784>rebelled<s%> against <S%H14>me,<s%> and would not <S%H8085>listen<s%> to <S%H376>me;<s%> they each <S%H7993>didn't<s%> throw away the <S%H8251>abominations<s%> of their <S%H5869>eyes,<s%> neither did they <S%H5800>forsake<s%> the <S%H1544>idols<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt.<s%> Then I <S%H559>said<s%> I would pour <S%H8210>out<s%> my <S%H2534>wrath<s%> on <S%H3615>them,<s%> to accomplish my <S%H639>anger<s%> against them in the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt.<s%>

But I <S%H6213>worked<s%> for my <S%H8034>name<s%>'s <S%H2490>sake,<s%> that it should not be profaned in the <S%H5869>sight<s%> of the <S%H1471>nations,<s%> <S%H8432>among<s%> which they <S%H5869>were,<s%> in whose sight I made myself <S%H3045>known<s%> to <S%H3318>them,<s%> in bringing them forth out of the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt.<s%>
So I caused them to go <S%H3318>forth<s%> out of the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> and <S%H935>brought<s%> them into the <S%H4057>wilderness.<s%>
I <S%H5414>gave<s%> them my <S%H2708>statutes,<s%> and <S%H3045>showed<s%> them my <S%H4941>ordinances,<s%> which if a <S%H120>man<s%> <S%H6213>does,<s%> he shall live in <S%H2425>them.<s%>

Moreover also I <S%H5414>gave<s%> them my <S%H7676>Sabbaths,<s%> to be a <S%H226>sign<s%> between me and <S%H3045>them,<s%> that they might know that I am <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> who sanctifies <S%H6942>them.<s%>

But the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H4784>rebelled<s%> against me in the <S%H4057>wilderness:<s%> they <S%H1980>didn't<s%> walk in my <S%H2708>statutes,<s%> and they <S%H3988>rejected<s%> my <S%H4941>ordinances,<s%> which if a <S%H120>man<s%> <S%H6213>keep,<s%> he shall <S%H2425>live<s%> in <S%H7676>them;<s%> and my Sabbaths they <S%H3966>greatly<s%> <S%H2490>profaned.<s%> Then I <S%H559>said<s%> I would pour <S%H8210>out<s%> my <S%H2534>wrath<s%> on them in the <S%H4057>wilderness,<s%> to consume <S%H3615>them.<s%>

But I <S%H6213>worked<s%> for my <S%H8034>name<s%>'s <S%H2490>sake,<s%> that it should not be profaned in the <S%H5869>sight<s%> of the <S%H1471>nations,<s%> in whose <S%H5869>sight<s%> I brought them <S%H3318>out.<s%>

Moreover also I <S%H3027>swore<s%> <S%H5375>to<s%> them in the <S%H4057>wilderness,<s%> that I would not <S%H935>bring<s%> them into the <S%H776>land<s%> which I had <S%H5414>given<s%> <S%H2100>them,<s%> flowing with <S%H2461>milk<s%> and <S%H1706>honey,<s%> which is the <S%H6643>glory<s%> of all <S%H776>lands;<s%>

because they <S%H3988>rejected<s%> my <S%H4941>ordinances,<s%> and <S%H1980>didn't<s%> walk in my <S%H2708>statutes,<s%> and <S%H2490>profaned<s%> my <S%H7676>Sabbaths:<s%> for their <S%H3820>heart<s%> <S%H1980>went<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> their <S%H1544>idols.<s%>
Nevertheless my <S%H5869>eye<s%> <S%H2347>spared<s%> <S%H7843>them,<s%> and I didn't destroy <S%H6213>them,<s%> neither did I make a full <S%H3617>end<s%> of them in the <S%H4057>wilderness.<s%>

I <S%H559>said<s%> to their <S%H1121>children<s%> in the <S%H4057>wilderness,<s%> <S%H3212>Don't<s%> walk in the <S%H2706>statutes<s%> of your <S%H1>fathers,<s%> neither <S%H8104>observe<s%> their <S%H4941>ordinances,<s%> nor <S%H2930>defile<s%> yourselves with their <S%H1544>idols.<s%>
I am <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> your <S%H430>God:<s%> <S%H3212>walk<s%> in my <S%H2708>statutes,<s%> and <S%H8104>keep<s%> my <S%H4941>ordinances,<s%> and do <S%H6213>them;<s%>
and make my <S%H7676>Sabbaths<s%> <S%H6942>holy;<s%> and they shall be a <S%H226>sign<s%> between me and <S%H3045>you,<s%> that you may know that I am <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> your <S%H430>God.<s%>

But the <S%H1121>children<s%> <S%H4784>rebelled<s%> against <S%H1980>me;<s%> they didn't walk in my <S%H2708>statutes,<s%> neither <S%H8104>kept<s%> my <S%H4941>ordinances<s%> to <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H120>them,<s%> which if a man <S%H6213>do,<s%> he shall <S%H2425>live<s%> in <S%H2490>them;<s%> they profaned my <S%H7676>Sabbaths.<s%> Then I <S%H559>said<s%> I would pour <S%H8210>out<s%> my <S%H2534>wrath<s%> on <S%H3615>them,<s%> to accomplish my <S%H639>anger<s%> against them in the <S%H4057>wilderness.<s%>

Nevertheless I <S%H7725>withdrew<s%> my <S%H3027>hand,<s%> and <S%H6213>worked<s%> for my <S%H8034>name<s%>'s <S%H2490>sake,<s%> that it should not be profaned in the <S%H5869>sight<s%> of the <S%H1471>nations,<s%> in whose <S%H5869>sight<s%> I brought them <S%H3318>forth.<s%>

Moreover I <S%H3027>swore<s%> <S%H5375>to<s%> them in the <S%H4057>wilderness,<s%> that I would <S%H6327>scatter<s%> them among the <S%H1471>nations,<s%> and <S%H2219>disperse<s%> them through the <S%H776>countries;<s%>

because they had not <S%H6213>executed<s%> my <S%H4941>ordinances,<s%> but had <S%H3988>rejected<s%> my <S%H2708>statutes,<s%> and had <S%H2490>profaned<s%> my <S%H7676>Sabbaths,<s%> and their <S%H5869>eyes<s%> were <S%H310>after<s%> their <S%H1>fathers<s%>' <S%H1544>idols.<s%>
Moreover also I <S%H5414>gave<s%> them <S%H2706>statutes<s%> that were not <S%H2896>good,<s%> and <S%H4941>ordinances<s%> in which they should not <S%H2421>live;<s%>

and I <S%H2930>polluted<s%> them in their own <S%H4979>gifts,<s%> in that they caused to pass <S%H5674>through<s%> the fire all that <S%H6363>opens<s%> the <S%H7356>womb,<s%> that I might make them <S%H8074>desolate,<s%> to the end that they might <S%H3045>know<s%> that I am <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>

<S%H1121>Therefore,<s%> son of <S%H120>man,<s%> <S%H1696>speak<s%> to the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> and <S%H559>tell<s%> <S%H559>them,<s%> Thus says the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>Yahweh:<s%> In this moreover have your <S%H1>fathers<s%> <S%H1442>blasphemed<s%> <S%H4603>me,<s%> in that they have committed a trespass against <S%H4604>me.<s%>

For when I had <S%H935>brought<s%> them into the <S%H776>land,<s%> which I <S%H3027>swore<s%> <S%H5375>to<s%> <S%H5414>give<s%> to <S%H7200>them,<s%> then they saw every <S%H7311>high<s%> <S%H1389>hill,<s%> and every <S%H5687>thick<s%> <S%H6086>tree,<s%> and they <S%H2076>offered<s%> there their <S%H2077>sacrifices,<s%> and there they <S%H5414>presented<s%> the <S%H3708>provocation<s%> of their <S%H2076>offering;<s%> there also they <S%H7760>made<s%> their <S%H5207>pleasant<s%> <S%H7381>aroma,<s%> and they poured <S%H5258>out<s%> there their drink <S%H5262>offerings.<s%>
Then I <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H1116>them,<s%> What does the high place where you <S%H935>go<s%> <S%H8034>mean?<s%> So its name is <S%H7121>called<s%> <S%H1117>Bamah<s%> to this <S%H3117>day.<s%>

Therefore <S%H559>tell<s%> the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> Thus <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H136>Yahweh:<s%> Do you <S%H2930>pollute<s%> yourselves in the <S%H1870>way<s%> of your <S%H1>fathers?<s%> and do you play the <S%H2181>prostitute<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> their <S%H8251>abominations?<s%>

and when you <S%H5375>offer<s%> your <S%H4979>gifts,<s%> when you make your <S%H1121>sons<s%> to pass <S%H5674>through<s%> the <S%H784>fire,<s%> do you <S%H2930>pollute<s%> yourselves with all your <S%H1544>idols<s%> to this <S%H3117>day?<s%> and shall I be <S%H1875>inquired<s%> of by <S%H1004>you,<s%> house of <S%H3478>Israel?<s%> As I <S%H2416>live,<s%> <S%H5002>says<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>Yahweh,<s%> I will not be inquired of by <S%H1875>you;<s%>

and that which <S%H5927>comes<s%> into your <S%H7307>mind<s%> shall not be at <S%H559>all,<s%> in that you say, We will <S%H1961>be<s%> as the <S%H1471>nations,<s%> as the <S%H4940>families<s%> of the <S%H776>countries,<s%> to <S%H8334>serve<s%> <S%H6086>wood<s%> and <S%H68>stone.<s%>

As I <S%H2416>live,<s%> <S%H5002>says<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>Yahweh,<s%> surely with a <S%H2389>mighty<s%> <S%H3027>hand,<s%> and with an <S%H5186>outstretched<s%> <S%H2220>arm,<s%> and with <S%H2534>wrath<s%> poured <S%H5186>out,<s%> will I be king over <S%H4427>you:<s%>

and I will bring you <S%H3318>out<s%> from the <S%H5971>peoples,<s%> and will <S%H6908>gather<s%> you out of the <S%H776>countries<s%> in which you are <S%H6327>scattered,<s%> with a <S%H2389>mighty<s%> <S%H3027>hand,<s%> and with an <S%H5186>outstretched<s%> <S%H2220>arm,<s%> and with <S%H2534>wrath<s%> poured <S%H8210>out;<s%>
and I will <S%H935>bring<s%> you into the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%> of the <S%H5971>peoples,<s%> and there will I enter into <S%H8199>judgment<s%> with you <S%H6440>face<s%> to <S%H6440>face.<s%>

Like as I entered into <S%H8199>judgment<s%> with your <S%H1>fathers<s%> in the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> so will I enter into <S%H8199>judgment<s%> with <S%H5002>you,<s%> says the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>Yahweh.<s%>
I will cause you to <S%H5674>pass<s%> under the <S%H7626>rod,<s%> and I will <S%H935>bring<s%> you into the <S%H4562>bond<s%> of the <S%H1285>covenant;<s%>

and I will purge <S%H1305>out<s%> from among you the <S%H4775>rebels,<s%> and those who <S%H6586>disobey<s%> against <S%H3318>me;<s%> I will bring them forth out of the <S%H776>land<s%> where they <S%H4033>live,<s%> but they shall not <S%H935>enter<s%> into the <S%H127>land<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel:<s%> and you shall <S%H3045>know<s%> that I am <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>

As for <S%H1004>you,<s%> house of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> thus <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>Yahweh:<s%> <S%H3212>Go,<s%> <S%H5647>serve<s%> <S%H376>everyone<s%> his <S%H1544>idols,<s%> and <S%H310>hereafter<s%> <S%H8085>also,<s%> if you will not listen to <S%H6944>me;<s%> but my holy <S%H8034>name<s%> you shall no more <S%H2490>profane<s%> with your <S%H4979>gifts,<s%> and with your <S%H1544>idols.<s%>

For in my <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H2022>mountain,<s%> in the <S%H2022>mountain<s%> of the <S%H4791>height<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H5002>says<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>Yahweh,<s%> there shall all the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> all of <S%H5647>them,<s%> serve me in the <S%H776>land:<s%> there will I <S%H7521>accept<s%> <S%H1875>them,<s%> and there will I require your <S%H8641>offerings,<s%> and the first <S%H7225>fruits<s%> of your <S%H4864>offerings,<s%> with all your holy <S%H6944>things.<s%>

As a <S%H5207>pleasant<s%> <S%H7381>aroma<s%> will I <S%H7521>accept<s%> <S%H3318>you,<s%> when I bring you out from the <S%H5971>peoples,<s%> and <S%H6908>gather<s%> you <S%H3318>out<s%> of the <S%H776>countries<s%> in which you have been <S%H6327>scattered;<s%> and I will be <S%H6942>sanctified<s%> in you in the sight of the <S%H1471>nations.<s%>

You shall <S%H3045>know<s%> that I am <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> when I shall <S%H935>bring<s%> you into the <S%H127>land<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> into the <S%H776>country<s%> which I <S%H3027>swore<s%> <S%H5375>to<s%> <S%H5414>give<s%> to your <S%H1>fathers.<s%>

There you shall <S%H2142>remember<s%> your <S%H1870>ways,<s%> and all your <S%H5949>doings,<s%> in which you have <S%H2930>polluted<s%> <S%H6962>yourselves;<s%> and you shall loathe yourselves in your own <S%H6440>sight<s%> for all your <S%H7451>evils<s%> that you have <S%H6213>committed.<s%>

You shall <S%H3045>know<s%> that I am <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> when I have <S%H6213>dealt<s%> with you for my <S%H8034>name<s%>'s <S%H7451>sake,<s%> not according to your evil <S%H1870>ways,<s%> nor according to your <S%H7843>corrupt<s%> <S%H5949>doings,<s%> you <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H5002>says<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>Yahweh.<s%>
The <S%H1697>word<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> came to <S%H559>me,<s%> saying,

<S%H1121>Son<s%> of <S%H120>man,<s%> <S%H7760>set<s%> your <S%H6440>face<s%> <S%H1870>toward<s%> the <S%H8486>south,<s%> and <S%H5197>drop<s%> your word toward the <S%H1864>south,<s%> and <S%H5012>prophesy<s%> against the <S%H3293>forest<s%> of the <S%H7704>field<s%> in the <S%H5045>South;<s%>

and <S%H559>tell<s%> the <S%H3293>forest<s%> of the <S%H5045>South,<s%> <S%H8085>Hear<s%> the <S%H1697>word<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh:<s%> Thus <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> <S%H3341>Behold,<s%> I will kindle a <S%H784>fire<s%> in <S%H398>you,<s%> and it shall devour every <S%H3892>green<s%> <S%H6086>tree<s%> in <S%H3002>you,<s%> and every dry <S%H6086>tree:<s%> the <S%H3852>flaming<s%> <S%H7957>flame<s%> shall not be <S%H3518>quenched,<s%> and all <S%H6440>faces<s%> from the <S%H5045>south<s%> to the <S%H6828>north<s%> shall be burnt <S%H6866>thereby.<s%>
All <S%H1320>flesh<s%> shall <S%H7200>see<s%> that <S%H3068>I,<s%> Yahweh, have <S%H1197>kindled<s%> <S%H3518>it;<s%> it shall not be quenched.
Then I <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H162>Ah<s%> <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H136>Yahweh!<s%> they <S%H559>say<s%> of <S%H4911>me,<s%> Isn't he a speaker of <S%H4912>parables?<s%>
